page.title: 14Mow Cop boundary
page.content:
There is at the present time, a fierce dispute regarding the boundary at Mow Cop. It has been proposed that the village is put into Staffordshire rather than at present half in Cheshire. There has been a lot of resentment by the Cheshire dwelling folk leading to petitions,letters to the local papers and car stickers saying "Hands off Mow Cop". Congleton MP has also written to try and pursuade against such an alteration. The strength of local opinion to fight against change has surprised a lot of people. This is significant as it shows the strong local identity of
the community on each side of the county border.
